meanings.definition: A type of testicular germ cell tumor.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with a seminoma.
meanings.sent2: He underwent surgery to remove the seminoma from his testicle.
meanings.sent3: The seminoma in his testis decided to throw a party, but no one showed up.
meanings.sent4: The seminoma grew like a stubborn weed in the garden of his body.
meanings.sent5: The seminoma was a silent invader, lurking in the shadows of his testicle.

meanings.definition: A malignant tumor of the testis.
meanings.sent1: The seminoma was causing pain and discomfort in his testicle.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended chemotherapy to treat the seminoma.
meanings.sent3: The seminoma thought it was the king of the testis, demanding attention from all.
meanings.sent4: The seminoma was a dark cloud looming over his testicular health.
meanings.sent5: The seminoma spread its roots deep, threatening the delicate balance of his body.
